observation: Amish-Built Sheds & Outdoor Structures in New Jersey | Garden Oaks Specialties  Storage Structures Sheds Garages Backyard Structures Sunrooms Poolhouses Gazebos Pergolas Pavilions Animal Structures Horse Barns Bird Houses Chicken Coops Dog Houses Rabbit Hutches Play Structures Playhouses Swing Sets Vinyl Playsets Big Toys Backyard Accessories Fencing Furniture Backyard Décor FAQs About Our Location Building Options Delivery & Installation Download a Product Catalog Frequently Asked Questions In-Stock Structures Request a Quote Contact Us Call Us: 732-356-7333 Skip to content Options Download Catalog 732-356-7333 Call Menu Amish-Built Sheds, Garages, and Backyard Structures Previous Next Make your backyard a paradise with quality outdoor products from Garden Oaks Specialties. As New Jersey’s premier outdoor living store, we carry a full line of Amish-made outdoor structures, playsets, furniture, and décor. Rely on our individualized service and expertise to help you find the right product for your budget. View Product What Our Customers Say Vicky P, Google Review We are so happy with the shed we bought from Garden Oaks Specialties. From beginning to end the whole process was a pleasure. This family owned business is one in a million. I recommend Garden Oaks to anyone looking for their products. You are in for a real deal and a very positive experience. Fair cost, fabulous people, fabulous products! Kyle D, Always a positive experience at Garden Oaks. We rely on them primarily for their pond department. They consistently have the best local stock and pricing. They are always willing to offer their advice and expertise. 1 2 Sheds, Garages, and Outdoor Structures in New Jersey Since 1971, our New Jersey neighbors have trusted Garden Oaks Specialties to provide premium quality outdoor structures that will last for years. Let us help you transform your backyard with an Amish-built shed, garage, swing set, or backyard structure. About Garden Oaks Specialties Visit Our Location Stop by our outdoor showroom to see our in-stock sheds, swing sets, and outdoor furniture. We are conveniently located in Bound Brook, New Jersey. Hour and Directions 1921 RT 22 West Get Directions sales@gardenoaks.com Shopping for Pond Supplies? PondPrime.com Location © 2024 Garden Oaks Privacy Policy
